answers.answer: Mari,have you found out what is going on yet? Recently (starting about a month and a half ago) I have been having the same exact symptoms as you have explained. I have been trying to figure out what is going on with no luck. I am 20 years old and have to other health issues that I am aware of.

question: For the past 15 years I ge abdomina pain like my abdomen is stretching, fever of 101 chills, headache and body aches. No nausea vomiting or diarrhea. It last 12 hours or less, although mild soreness in the belly last a few days. It used to happen 1 or twice a year but now has increased to every 2 weeks. I had colonoscopy and CT scan of abdomen and pelvis. Both normal. I am not Sephardic, I am Ashkenazy jewish women age 59 yo. I also have diabetes ( 2 years) and chronic constipation. I am taking Lipitor, Metformin and Diovan. I am a RN but Iam perplexed. Any ideas?? Mari
title: abdominal pain fever and chills
